subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The Harmon brothers, Butch, Bill and Craig (a fourth brother, Dick, died this year), have spent a lifetime connected to Winged Foot Golf Club through their father, Claude, the club's longtime head golf professional.
snippet: The Harmon brothers, Butch, Bill and Craig (a fourth brother, Dick, died this year), have spent a lifetime connected to Winged Foot Golf Club through their father, Claude, the club's longtime head golf professional.
